Firecrackers.name: Buck Shot
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Blindness duration by +1.5 to 2.5 seconds.
Increases the duration of the Deafened Status Effect by +0 to 2 seconds.

Firecrackers.name: Flash Powder
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Blindness duration by +10 %.

Firecrackers.name: Medium Fuse
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation delay by +0.75 seconds.

Firecrackers.name: Gun Powder
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Blindness duration by +20 %.

Firecrackers.name: Long Fuse
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation delay by +1.5 seconds.

Firecrackers.name: Magnesium Powder
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation radius by +2.5 metres.

Firecrackers.name: Black Powder
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation radius by +5 metres.

Firecrackers.name: Large Pack
Firecrackers.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the number of available Uses by +2.

Flashlights.name: Battery
Flashlights.description:
A standard battery of unknown brand.
Increases the Battery life by +2 seconds.
"Another nearly empty battery."

Flashlights.name: Leather Grip
Flashlights.description:
A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.
Increases the Aim accuracy by +20 %.
"Too many have fallen due to sweaty hands."

Flashlights.name: Power Bulb
Flashlights.description:
A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +20 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +10 %.
"Even the most powerful light cannot pierce through The Black Fog's darkness."

Flashlights.name: Wide Lens
Flashlights.description:
A thin wide lens in perfect condition.Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.
Increases the width of the Beam by +25 %.
Reduces the reach of the Beam by -25 %.

Flashlights.name: Focus Lens
Flashlights.description:
A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.
Increases the reach of the Beam by +25 %.
Increases the brightness by +20 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +10 %.
Reduces the width of the Beam by -15 %.

Flashlights.name: Heavy Duty Battery
Flashlights.description:
A battery marked as "industrial strength".
Increases the Battery life by +4 seconds.
"A battery advertised as lasting 8 hours lasts only a couple of seconds in The Black Fog."

Flashlights.name: Low Amp Filament
Flashlights.description:
A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.
Reduces the Battery Depletion rate by -24 %.

Flashlights.name: Rubber Grip
Flashlights.description:
A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.
Increases the Aim accuracy by +40 %.

Flashlights.name: TIR Optic
Flashlights.description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +30 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +15 %.
"Let the light burn them out of their dark shroud."

Flashlights.name: Intense Halogen
Flashlights.description:
A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +40 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +20 %.

Flashlights.name: Long Life Battery
Flashlights.description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.
Extends the Battery life by +6 seconds.

Flashlights.name: High-End Sapphire Lens
Flashlights.description:
A wide lens made of unscratchable sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.
Increases the reach of the Beam by +25 %.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +30 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +15 %.
Reduces the width of the Beam by -25 %.

Flashlights.name: Odd Bulb
Flashlights.description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +50 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +25 %.
Increases the Battery Depletion rate by +14 %.

Flashlights.name: Broken Bulb
Flashlights.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE (This Unlockable no longer spawns in the Bloodweb and can no longer be used in Trials, being greyed-out in the inventory.It may temporarily return during an Event.) 
A damaged bulb that causes a spooky flickering effect.

Causes the Flashlight to flicker.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +15 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +30 %.
Increases the spookiness.
The Broken Bulb is only available during Halloween Events.

Keys.name: Prayer Rope
Keys.description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals.
Increases the Use time of Keys by 10 seconds.
"Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in the Fog."

Keys.name: Eroded Token
Keys.description:
A heavily worn out token made of brass.If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared.
The Auras of other Survivors within 24 metres are revealed to you while Mind Channel is active.
Eroded Token does not stack with Gold Token.

Keys.name: Prayer Beads
Keys.description:
A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying ritual.
Increases the Use time of Keys by 15 seconds.

Keys.name: Scratched Pearl
Keys.description:
A porous and scratched white pearl.A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the key.
Increases the Aura-reading range of Keys by +12 metres.
"Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in the Fog."

Keys.name: Gold Token
Keys.description:
A gold token with a dull appearance.Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions.
The Auras of other Survivors within 48 metres are revealed to you while Mind Channel is active.
Gold Token does not stack with Eroded Token.

Keys.name: Blood Amber
Keys.description:
A blood-red amber striped with black veins.The amber is warm to the touch.
The Aura of the Killer within 32 metres is revealed to you while Mind Channel is active.
Increases the Depletion rate by +100 %.

Keys.name: Milky Glass
Keys.description:
This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise.Channels the Black Fog's energy.
Using a Key to open the closed Hatch consumes this Add-on instead.

Keys.name: Unique Wedding Ring
Keys.description:
An engraved wedding ring that emerged from the Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy.
The Aura of the Obsession is automatically revealed to you at all times.
This does not require using the Mind Channel ability.
Reduces the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by -100 %.

Keys.name: Weaved Ring
Keys.description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen.The ring binds the Key to its user, preventing loss even in the darkest of times.
Causes this Add-on to be consumed upon death instead of the Key.

Maps.name: Map Addendum
Maps.description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material.A partial and faded map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.
Increases the Durability of the Map by +5 seconds.

Maps.name: Glass Bead
Maps.description:
A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the map and mark a specific position.The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.
Press the Secondary Action button while using the Map to use the Glass Bead to place a Pillar of Light at your current location that can be seen by all Survivors.

Maps.name: Red Twine
Maps.description:
A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red colour.Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track Killer Belongings.

Maps.name: Retardant Jelly
Maps.description:
A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade.This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.
Reduces the Depletion rate by -20 %.

Maps.name: Unusual Stamp
Maps.description:
A wooden stamp with a cross-hatched rubber pad used to mark documents.It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used.
Increases the Object Tracking range by +8 metres.

Maps.name: Yellow Wire
Maps.description:
A small electrical wire.Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location.Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track the Exit Gate Switches

Maps.name: Black Silk Cord
Maps.description:
A smooth black cord with a soft appearance.Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch.

Maps.name: Odd Stamp
Maps.description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood.The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od".
Increases the Object Tracking range by +12 metres.

Maps.name: Crystal Bead
Maps.description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus.The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.
Reveals the tracked Auras to all Survivors.

Med-Kits.name: Bandages
Med-Kits.description:
A pack of bandages usually found in First Aid Kits.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +8 Charges.

Med-Kits.name: Butterfly Tape
Med-Kits.description:
Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.
Increases the Healing speed by +5 %.

Med-Kits.name: Rubber Gloves
Med-Kits.description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.
Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.

Med-Kits.name: Medical Scissors
Med-Kits.description:
Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.
Increases the Healing speed by +10 %.

Med-Kits.name: Needle & Thread
Med-Kits.description:
Not exactly a medical device.However, it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.
Increases the Odds of triggering Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.
Increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Healing Skill Checks by +5 %.

Med-Kits.name: Self Adherent Wrap
Med-Kits.description:
A pack of bandages that stick to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.
Increases the Healing speed by +5 %.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +8 Charges.

Med-Kits.name: Sponge
Med-Kits.description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.
Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +20 %.

Med-Kits.name: Gauze Roll
Med-Kits.description:
A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds.Part of a total wound care system.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +10 Charges.

Med-Kits.name: Surgical Suture
Med-Kits.description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue.Even though it is very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.
Increases the Odds of triggering Healing Skill Checks by +15 %.
Increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.

Med-Kits.name: Abdominal Dressing
Med-Kits.description:
A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.
Increases the Healing speed of Med-Kits by +15 %.

Med-Kits.name: Styptic Agent
Med-Kits.description:
A white powder with coagulant properties.Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from haemorrhaging.
Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Styptic Agent to grant the Endurance Status Effect for 5 seconds.
Endurance is cancelled prematurely when performing a Conspicuous Action.
Styptic Agent consumes the Med-Kit on use.

Med-Kits.name: Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe
Med-Kits.description:
An anti-haemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.
Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe to automatically heal the affected Survivor for 1 Health State over the next 16 seconds.
Healing Speed modifiers affect the Healing time.
Taking damage or being picked up by the Killer cancels the Healing effect.
Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe consumes the Med-Kit on use.

Med-Kits.name: Gel Dressings
Med-Kits.description:
A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exuding wounds.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +16 Charges.

Med-Kits.name: Refined Serum
Med-Kits.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE (This Unlockable no longer spawns in the Bloodweb and can no longer be used in Trials, being greyed-out in the inventory.It may temporarily return during an Event.) 
A refined version of the Putrid Serum that is mostly safe for human consumption.Mostly.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Refined Serum to boost the Movement speed of the affected Survivor by +5 % for 16 seconds.
Creates a Blight trail behind the affected Survivor.
Refined Serum consumes the Med-Kit on use.

The Refined Serum is only available during Halloween Events.

Toolboxes.name: Clean Rag
Toolboxes.description:
A mundane rag.
Suspiciously clean.
Increases the Repair speed of the Toolbox by +20 %.

Toolboxes.name: Instructions
Toolboxes.description:
Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.
Suppresses all normal Skill Checks that are usually triggered while repairing a Generator.

Toolboxes.name: Scraps
Toolboxes.description:
Springs, screws and gears.
Mostly unusable junk.
Increases the Capacity of the Toolbox by +8 Charges.

Toolboxes.name: Cutting Wire
Toolboxes.description:
A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.
Increases the Sabotage speed of the Toolbox by +15 %.

Toolboxes.name: Protective Gloves
Toolboxes.description:
Thick gloves, which reduce manual dexterity but protect hands from injury.
Suppresses the Loud Noise Notification to the Killer that is usually triggered after sabotaging a Hook.

Toolboxes.name: Socket Swivels
Toolboxes.description:
Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.
Increases the Repair speed of the Toolbox by +30 %.

Toolboxes.name: Spring Clamp
Toolboxes.description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.
Reduces the range at which your Generator-Repair noises can be heard by -8 metres.

Toolboxes.name: Wire Spool
Toolboxes.description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.
Increases the Capacity of the Toolbox by +12 Charges.

Toolboxes.name: Grip Wrench
Toolboxes.description:
An adjustable wrench with a tough grip.
Essential in any Toolbox.
Increases the Auto-Repair timer for sabotaged Hooks by +15 seconds.

Toolboxes.name: Hacksaw
Toolboxes.description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.
Increases the Sabotage speed of the Toolbox by +20 %.

Toolboxes.name: Brand New Part
Toolboxes.description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place.It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.
Replaces the Toolbox Repair prompt with an Install Brand New Part prompt instead:
Installing the Brand New Part triggers 1 difficult Skill Check.
Reduces that Generator's Repair requirement permanently by -10 Charges after succeeding the Skill Check.
Brand New Part is consumed on use.
